title: Storytelling Scriptwriter for Manga Youtube videos
description:
I’m looking for 5 top scriptwriters who meet the following criteria. :)

- 4000 words minimum - 8000 words max
- $1 per 100 words Ex: 1 x 8000 = $80
- 3 Scripts per week
- No high plagiarism score
- Work with our strategies
- Video EXAMPLE: https://youtu.be/wpH-60kGfEk

I would like to see examples of work you have done before.

Are you okay with the price from the description? (if not don't apply)
Did you add samples? (if not don't apply)
Do you have over 90% job success? (if not don't apply)
Do you have earned more than $100? (if not don't apply)
